content: christmas cactus socks instructions by missy s crafty mess cast on 64 stitches and knit a 20 row cuff in pattern 365knitsocks wordpress com with your contrasting color switch to your main color and follow the pattern to knit the leg of your sock heel flap knit 32 sts for the top of the foot in pattern and then switch to your cc for the heel flap & turn on the remaining 32 stitches row 1 sl1 k1 across row 2 sl1 knit wise p across turn knit and repeat these two row until you have worked a total of 32 row heel turn row 1 k 19 ssk k1 turn construction magic loop & top down with a heel row 2 sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn flap and gusset recommended needles us 1 5/2 5 mm continue working each row in this pattern until all recommended yarn west yorkshire spinners sock stitches have been worked yarn gusset abbreviations pick up and knit 16 stitches along the edge of the fc - faux cable heel flap with your mc knit across the 20 stitches on mc main color your needle from your heel turn and then pick up cc contrasting color and knit the last 16 stitches on the other side of your k - knit heel flap p - purl k2tog - knit 2 together row 1 knit across the 32 foot stitches in pattern k1 ssk - slip slip knit ssk knit until three stitches remain k2tog k1 yo - yarn over row 2 knit the 32 foot stitches in pattern knit across the gusset how to knit the faux cable concentrate on the next 3 stitches on the repeat these 2 row until a total of 64 stitches needle lift the 3rd stitch up over and off the remain 32 on the top and 32 on the bottom needle then knit as follows k1 yo k1 foot pattern knit in pattern until you reach your desired length of row 1 - 4 k3 p1 around foot i would recommend trying the sock on when row 5 fc p1 k3 p1 around you are about 2 inches from your desired foot length row 6 - 9 k3 p1 around row 10 k3 p1 fc p1 around closing the toe row 1 *k1 ssk knit until three stitches remain on please feel free to insert this stitch pattern into the top of the sock k2tog k1 * repeat for the sole of your favorite 64 stitch vanilla sock pattern or use the sock the following pattern row 2 k all st repeat row 1 & 2 until 28 stitches remain & close very pink knits has an awesome playlist of sock the toes with the kitchenier stitch tutorials -
